summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating the exhibiting or display of certain moving or motion pictures, operas, dramas, plays, stage of platform performances, exhibitions, and entertainments in places of amusement in theatres and other places open to the public; creating a Board of Theatre Supervisors and defining the duties and powers thereof; defining offenses and prescribing penalties; and repealing Ordinance No. 59764 as amended by Ordinance No. 61235, 64762 and 77284.
